mapper.select: select s.s_name, s.s_addr, s.s_phone, s.grade, s.s_num, s.id, s.img1, s.img2, s.img3, s.img4, nvl(r.cnt, 0) cnt from shop s left join (select s_num, count(*) as cnt from review group by s_num) r on s.s_num=r.s_num order by case when #{result} = 0 then s_num end asc ,case when #{result} = 1 then grade end desc , case when #{result} = 2 then grade end asc , case when #{result} = 3 then cnt end desc , case when #{result} = 4 then cnt end asc
select * from shop where s_name like '%' || #{word} ||'%'
select * from shop order by s_num asc
